title: Heisman Trophy Ceremony — Jazz at Lincoln Center

gallery.caption: Complete scenic package at The Appel Room
Portrait display of all 91+ Heisman recipients

summary: Bringing Broadway stagecraft to college football's highest honor. Mystic delivers the complete scenic package annually for college football's most prestigious award against NYC's iconic skyline.
challenge: The Appel Room's 50-foot glass wall creates a stunning but technically challenging backdrop. Design must work harmoniously with dramatic nighttime city views while supporting 14+ camera broadcast production.
approach: Working with Tony-nominated designer David Korins ('Hamilton,' 'Beetlejuice'), Mystic fabricated a larger-than-life Heisman Trophy replica (hand-carved by Rebecca Ward), winners portrait gallery, LED display housings, and automated scenic pieces — delivered annually since 2021.
result: Five consecutive ceremonies delivered (2021-2025), establishing Jazz at Lincoln Center as the ceremony's prestigious permanent home with Broadway-caliber production values.

testimonial.quote: We wanted to bring the power of visual storytelling so often the trademark of great Broadway stages to the Heisman Trophy presentation.
testimonial.author: Dan Cunningham
testimonial.title: Creative Director
